title: Nasus Dmg
body: So playing renekton with tl against nasus lvl 3 with tl he does half my hp with an q e like wtf is that he has no dmg stats at all like wtf

replies.body:
Nasus just stacks his Q, can go full damage and hurt like fuck. I have built an AD Nasus that by late game you can forget your health, there is no point, with some crit items you are able to one hit the squishies and with his natural, plus item lifesteal, you don't really even need defense.

The slow and masteries Oppressor, Double Edged Sword and Assassin means you get an extra 7.5% damage out of nothing. Add in Merciless and you get a total 12.5% extra damage below 40% health. Throw in Thuderlord's and my E > AA > Q will hurt like fuck, even better if you have an early Sheen.

Oh and Double Edged Sword, you take 1.5% more damage, that is 14% extra when you are low health.
